channel.title: Chair of Falsehoods
channel.description:
Sky Lizard: Jeeves Gandalf Boss Guy(Random) Swordy McGee Posh Guy Man who looks at you funny in pubs Jesus Metaphor Totally doesn't look evil SHE'S A WITCH! Boy Girl Spoopy Moustache
Not Visible: Posh Guy 2: The sequel Murdery Bloke Evil Girl Edgy More sinister than the name suggests Probably just a guy with a projector Boss Guy(Random) Smart Guy John Snow A herb? Distributor of Swords and Sword accessories Jeeves pre-promotion Those things people hang by their beds except more evil
Organisation: Biblical Reference? In Charge Person Person who does things Boss Guy(Random) Satanism Metaphor Opposite of Hider
Others: Al, the Chemist Idiot Boss Guy(Random) Secretly a Yandere Literally death Ghost? Bullied :frowning:
Afterwards: Posh boy Police Not King Those guys who say the earth is flat
http://tol.wikia.com/wiki/Classes
